Package com.twcable.grabbit.tools.monitor

Classes around monitoring Grabbit copy jobs on a client.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JobStatusCache
    A cache of the job status from the last time "start" was invoked.
    JobStatusPoller
    Polls the Grabbit instance for the current status of a job.
    PollingJobMonitor.B
    Simple namespace for builder classes/interfaces.
    PollingJobMonitor.B.Build  
    PollingJobMonitor.B.ExecutorOrEnvironment  
    PollingJobMonitor.B.WithEnvironment  
    PollingJobMonitor.B.WithExecutor  
    PollingJobMonitor.B.WithJobStatusCache  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HostJobState
    The state of the a job on a host.
    JobStatus
    An immutable value representing the status of a job, as returned by Grabbit’s REST API.
    PollingJobMonitor
    A job monitor that continually polls hosts to get their current status.
    PollingJobMonitor.B.Builder  
    RemoteJobStatusPoller
    A JobStatusPoller that connects to a remote instance for job information.
    SimpleFileJobStatusCache
    A simple file-based persistent implementation of JobStatusCache.
    SimpleMapJobStatusCache
    A simple Map persistent implementation of JobStatusCache.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JobState
    The state of the job.

Package com.twcable.grabbit.tools.monitor Description

Classes around monitoring Grabbit copy jobs on a client.

The principle class is PollingJobMonitor.
